entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Hey #Trump... when you’re done tweeting self-serving, whiny, woe-is-me victim BULLSHIT all day and night you might wanna focus on the deadly pandemic that still exists, is still infecting our citizens and has so far KILLED 100,000 of us...  #COVID19 #Coronavirus
